div.head: Letters read by a previous modern observer, but which cannot now be read
div.p: Letters read by a previous modern observer, but which cannot now be read
lb/Imperator apprdg resp="TRE"gap reason="lost" agent="damage" extent="6" unit="character"//rdgrdg resp="FHG"Caesar/rdg/applb/

NOTE: Entries in the respStmt in the teiHeader will be required to indicate who is meant by the values in the resp attribute on the rdg tag (in this case, TRE would signal the current editor, Tom Elliott, and FHG would signal a prior editor, Friedrick Hiller von GÃ¤rtringen)
TEI P4: 19.3 Using Apparatus Elements in Transcriptions; 18.2.4 The Use of the Gap, Del, Damage, Unclear and Supplied Tags in Combination
